```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

## Problem 1

Read and clean the Mr. Trach Wheel dataset.

```{r}
trash_df =
  read_xlsx(
    "./data2/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
    sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel",
    range = cell_cols("A:N")) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  drop_na(dumpster) %>% 
  mutate(
    sport_balls = round(sports_balls),
    sport_balls = as.integer(sports_balls)
  )


```
